paragraphs.headline: Introduction
values: This is the Orange Business Partner Radar, which gives an overview of our partner landscape from a European perspective.
The four quadrants of the Radar correspond to our four Strategic Value Propositions.
Each ring of the quadrants follows the qualification methodology (scouting, commercial, upcoming, strategic) of our Global Partner Office.
Please note: Multi-SVP partners such as Microsoft, Cisco and AWS are only included in the SVP where we currently have the strongest business (due to technical limitations).

paragraphs.headline: Contacts
values: If you have any questions, suggestions or updates, please contact Riham Atta, riham.atta@orange.com.
The Partner Radar is constantly updated by a core team:
- Riham Atta – Lead Business Analyst Europe
